title: Ennoda Rasi Nalla Raasi lyrics Mappillai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Ranjith, & Chorus
Song: Ennoda Rasi
Movie : Mappillai
Lyrics: taken fromÂ  old song.. (remix)

Ennoda raasi nalla raasi - adhu
eppodhum periyavanga aasi
Atha maga raasi, adha oor muzhukka pesi
kottu meLam kotti vaasi
Atha maga raasi, adha oor muzhukka pesi
kottu meLam kotti vaasi
Ennoda raasi nalla raasi - adhu
eppodhum periyavanga aasi

[Raasi ulla pakkam, dinam vetri vandhu serum
kaasu uLLa pakkam, verum thimuru vandhu serum ] (2)

Neram koodum podhu, indha oorum unnai paadum
nenjukuLLa nimmadhi varum
AaLu anbu sena, ada aththanayum koodum
vittupona sondhamum varum

kOdiyile oruththanukku raasi uchchathule
endha kuraigalume avan kittathaan thedi vandhadhille
edhu vandhaalum pOnaalum ottura mannudhaan ottumada

Maappilana maappila, vaasa karuvepila...
Maappilana maappila, vaasa karuvepila...
Pei pidicha pergal otividum vepila
Pei pidicha pergal otividum vepila
avar siripile
oru verupille
avaru kurubathaan
yaaru rasikkala
aiii deya danga deya danga deya danga thandhana

[Ooru vambu pesum, ada unmai solla koosum
Podum nooru vesham, dinam poiya solli aesum] (2)

Thilla taangu taangu, enna unga bongu
aendiamma indha raangu
Nalla illa pOkku, naan sonnen oru vaakku
vethalakkuL kotta paakku

Raaniamma manasu vecha nanma undaagum
nalla pecha ketkalena veedu reNdaagum
Ada aththaatchi piththaachu athanai vithaiyum sollungama ?

ennoda raasi nalla raasi ...
Atha maga raasi .......
ennoda raasi nalla raasi ...
